import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import SliderItem from './SliderItem' import M from "materialize-css" import {Loader} from '../components/Loader' import {useHttp} from '../hooks/http.hook' function Slider(props){ const {request, loading} = useHttp() useEffect(()=>{ var elems = document.querySelectorAll('.slider'); var instances = M.Slider.init(elems, {}); },[]) return( <>
) } export default Slider
